title: ENDONASAL LEISHMANIASIS IN A FROZEN SECTION BIOPSY SPECIMEN.
abstract: We present a case of endonasal leishmaniasis diagnosed on a frozen section biopsy specimen obtained from a 47-year-old woman treated with corticosteroids and anti-TNF
clean_text: endonasal leishmaniasis in a frozen section biopsy specimen we present a case of endonasal leishmaniasis diagnosed on a frozen section biopsy specimen obtained from a year old woman treated with corticosteroids and anti tnf
